Class Common

java.lang.Object
com.icx.common.base.Common
Direct Known Subclasses:
ComplexFieldHelpers, ConnectionPool, CResource, DeleteHelpers, DomainController, DomainObject, Helpers, JdbcHelpers, LoadHelpers, Reflection, SaveHelpers, SqlDb, SqlDbTable

    • objectsEqual

      public static boolean objectsEqual(Object o1, Object o2)
      Check if two - may be null - objects are equal
      Parameters:
      o1 - first object
      o2 - second object
      Returns:
      true if objects both are null or objects equal, false otherwise

    • compare

      public static <T extends Comparable> int compare(T o1, T o2)
      Compare two - may be null - objects
      Type Parameters:
      T - object type
      Parameters:
      o1 - first object
      o2 - second object
      Returns:
      result of o1.compareTo(o2) if both o1 and o2 are not null, 0 if both objects are null, 1 if only o2 is null and -1 if only o1 is null

    • toStringEqual

      public static boolean toStringEqual(Object o1, Object o2)
      Check if two - may be null - objects have same string representation
      Parameters:
      o1 - first object
      o2 - second object
      Returns:
      true if objects both are null or toString() invocation of both objects is equal, false otherwise

    • logicallyEqual

      public static boolean logicallyEqual(Object o1, Object o2)
      Check equality of two objects ignoring formal differences: (1) treat null values and empty strings, collections, maps as equal, (2) treat float, double values as equal if they are equal rounded to 5 decimals.
      Parameters:
      o1 - first object
      o2 - second object
      Returns:
      true if objects logically equal, false otherwise
